title: Just for You
description:
Little Critter is trying his best to be a help to his mother in this classic, funny, and heartwarming book.Whether he's trying to make breakfast, mow the lawn, or carry the groceries, both parents and children alike will cheerfully relate to this beloved story.
Mercer Mayer's
 
Little Critter
 stories, which address all the major issues of growing up, are perennial favorites to generations of readers of all ages.
author: Mercer Mayer
